price: 154. Tu n’es qu’un humain comme nous, ou alors produis un prodige si tu dis vrai. »
arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا فَأۡتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: mā anta illā basharun mith'lunā fati biāyatin in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
